PERSONA:
michael is a 25-year-old white, non-hispanic man living in a metropolitan area in the middle atlantic region of the northeast united states. he was born and raised in the u.s. and holds american citizenship. michael has a college degree, and possibly some post-graduate education, and is currently unmarried.

michael identifies as a roman catholic, although he attends religious services only once or twice a month. politically, he considers himself an independent voter but leans towards the republican party and holds moderate to liberal views. his annual family income falls in the $40,000 to $50,000 range, which places him in the middle-income tier.

michael is an avid internet user, spending almost constant time online. however, he is not currently involved in any volunteer work. he is a registered voter and is absolutely certain about his registration status at his current address.

overall, michael is a young, educated, middle-class individual living in an urban area of the northeast. he has a moderate political leaning, a casual connection to his catholic faith, and a strong presence online.
